name: axolotl
notes:
whip up an adorable axolotl in under an hour with this no-sew crochet axolotl pattern!

this quick and easy amigurumi axolotl has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing. it would make a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a fun gift.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

materials:

* super bulky yarn
* 4.5mm crochet hook
* 8mm safety eyes
* 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss
* polyester fiberfill
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors

the finished item measure approximately 3.25‚Äù (8.5cm) long. item size may vary depending on tension and materials used.


  [1]: https://www.stitchbyfay.com/no-sew-crochet-axolotl-pattern/
